programme.title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, this romantic drama features Emraan Hashmi and Vidya Balan. The story delves into the complexities of relationships, societal norms, and the sacrifices made for love.

programme.title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
programme.desc: Ramaiya Vastavaiya is a romantic drama directed by Prabhu Deva. It revolves around Ram (Girish Kumar), a rich and carefree NRI, who falls in love with Sona (Shruti Haasan), a simple village girl. When he proposes marriage, her protective brother (Sonu Sood) challenges him to prove that he can live and work like a farmer before earning her hand. Set in vibrant rural India, the film blends romance, comedy, and family drama with catchy music and traditional values.

programme.title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, this romantic drama features Emraan Hashmi and Vidya Balan. The story delves into the complexities of relationships, societal norms, and the sacrifices made for love.

programme.title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
programme.desc: Ramaiya Vastavaiya is a romantic drama directed by Prabhu Deva. It revolves around Ram (Girish Kumar), a rich and carefree NRI, who falls in love with Sona (Shruti Haasan), a simple village girl. When he proposes marriage, her protective brother (Sonu Sood) challenges him to prove that he can live and work like a farmer before earning her hand. Set in vibrant rural India, the film blends romance, comedy, and family drama with catchy music and traditional values.

programme.title: Love Hostel
programme.desc: Love Hostel is a gritty romantic thriller that explores the dark realities of honor killings in India. The story follows Ashu and Jyoti, a couple from different religious backgrounds who elope to escape the wrath of their families. As they seek a new beginning, they are relentlessly hunted by a ruthless mercenary hired to restore "family honor." Starring Vikrant Massey, Sanya Malhotra, and Bobby Deol, the film is a raw and intense portrayal of love caught in the crossfire of social prejudice and violence. Directed by Shanker Raman, the movie is a chilling commentary on intolerance and the price of defiance.

programme.title: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, this romantic drama features Emraan Hashmi and Vidya Balan. The story delves into the complexities of relationships, societal norms, and the sacrifices made for love.

programme.title: Good Boy Bad Boy
programme.desc: Directed by Ashwini Chaudhary, this coming-of-age drama features Emraan Hashmi and Tusshar Kapoor as students with contrasting personalities. When they switch places, chaos ensues, affecting their academic and personal lives. The film is a remake of the 1992 movie Class Act.

programme.title: Shakti - The Power
programme.desc: Directed by Krishna Vamsi, this drama stars Karisma Kapoor as Nandini, who, after her husband's death, finds herself trapped in a violent and oppressive village. Determined to escape with her son, she battles societal norms and familial opposition.

programme.title: Apna Sapna Money Money
programme.desc: Directed by Sangeeth Sivan, this ensemble comedy follows a colorful cast including a cross-dressing conman, a gangster, and a fake priest all scheming to get rich quick. The film features Suniel Shetty, Ritesh Deshmukh, and Shreyas Talpade, and offers a mix of slapstick humor and mistaken identities.
